name: Kangaroo
description: "Kangaroo Token is a crypto token that has been created by a group of animal enthusiast who are experienced in cryptocurrencies and trading. The idea behind the Kangaroo token project is saving the animals and natural habitats around the world by donating to animal rights charities and rescue organisations as well as increasing animal right awareness amongst the people The Kangaroo Token Protocol is community-driven, Four simple functions occur during each trade: Reflection, LP Acquisition, community assistance & Burn."
